title: Basket
text: These various sized baskets, all made exclusively for the tourist market, share similar fret designs.  The Akimel O'othom and Tohono O'odham often employ the same designs in their basketry because they intermarried, traded, and shared many aspects of each other's traditions and language.
description: miniature basket, deep and vertical walled; finely coiled; design is a slanted meander in natural and black (possibly devil\'s claw.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
